body_html:
@colesbury
I installed from source, using cuda V8.0.61. There now appears to be a memory leak, every iteration increases the GPU memory, until eventually throwing

RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (2) : out of memory at /home/ubuntu/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58
body:
@colesbury 
I installed from source, using `cuda V8.0.61`. There now appears to be a memory leak, every iteration increases the GPU memory, until eventually throwing 

```
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (2) : out of memory at /home/ubuntu/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu:58
```
